name: game_url
description: Public viewer URL for the game on chess.com

name: start_time
description: UTC timestamp when the game started (Daily only)

name: end_time
description: UTC timestamp when the game ended

name: type
description: Derived: 'daily' if time_class is daily; else 'live'

name: tc_base
description: Derived: live base time from time_control

name: tc_corr
description: Derived: daily response seconds from time_control (1/SECONDS)

name: white.rating
description: White rating at time of game

name: white.id
description: Published Data API player URL for white

name: black.rating
description: Black rating at time of game

name: black.id
description: Published Data API player URL for black

name: match_link
description: Published Data API team match link (optional)

name: clock_times
description: Derived post-move clock times aligned to SAN (single-quoted JSON)

name: time_spent
description: Derived per-move time spent aligned to SAN (single-quoted JSON)

name: start_dt
description: Local start datetime from start_time or PGN UTC

name: duration
description: Duration in seconds (end_time - start_time when available)

name: end_reason
description: Reason game ended (loser result or draw reason)

name: my_id
description: My Published Data API player URL

name: opp_id
description: Opponent Published Data API player URL
